div.a: Read More about Why Choose Quitman County School District

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-3 col-lg-3 backgroundcolor right3column

div.p: Welcome to the new Quitman County School District website! We are extremely excited about the many great things happening in the district. The web site is one of several tools we will use to keep the community informed of current news and events within the school district. We strive daily to provide a fair and equitable education to all students to support our vision of educational excellence that will lead to the positive development of 21st Century learners and leaders.
